price: Burqituuwwan dachii burqisiifnee bishaan (samiifi dachii) murtii dhugumaan murtaa’e irratti walitti dhufan.
arabic: وَفَجَّرۡنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ عُيُونٗا فَٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرٖ قَدۡ قُدِرَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wafajjarnā al-arḍa ʿuyūnan fal-taqā al-māu ʿalā amrin qad qudira
